ModuleDescription: This course is an introduction to the laboratory techniques in analytical and organic chemistry with an emphasis on the fundamental principles and utilisation of state-of-the-art instruments.
Prerequisite: YSC1207 General Chemistry: Molecular Structure and Reactivity; OR with the permission of the instructor
Preclusion: YSC2207 Techniques in Analytical Chemistry and YSC2208 Techniques in Organic Chemistry (previous module codes)
